pages.question_text: Do you have a National Insurance number?
Your title
Your last name or family name
Your first name and any middle names
Have you ever been known by any other last names or family names including your maiden name?
Your date of birth
Your address
Have you lived at this address for more than 12 months?
Tell us your last address
Your mobile number or landline if you do not have a mobile
pages.hint_text: We may contact you about your claim or number may not show up if we call you.

pages.question_text: What is your nationality?
pages.hint_text: This is shown on your passport if you have one, for example, British, Irish, French, Polish.

pages.question_text: Have you claimed Child Benefit for any children before?
Are you currently entitled to or receiving Child Benefit?
What is your partner's employment status?

options.text: Looking for work in the UK
options.value: Looking for work in the UK

options.text: None of these - they have enough money to support their family in the UK
options.value: None of these - they have enough money to support their family in the UK

pages.question_text: Is your partner a member of HM Forces or a civil servant working abroad?
Does your partner now, or have they at any time in the last 3 months, worked in another country or received benefit from another country?
Is your partner entitled to Child Benefit now or are they waiting to hear if they can get Child Benefit?
What is the full name of the eldest child your partner is entitled to Child Benefit for?
Child's date of birth
How many children are you claiming for on this form?
How many original birth certificates, adoption certificates, passports or travel documents are you sending us? If you do not send original documents a decision on your claim may be delayed.
pages.hint_text: Birth certificates - only send if the child's birth was registered in Northern Ireland or outside the UK, Adoption certificates, Passports, Travel documents

pages.question_text: Child's full name including last or family name
Is this child male or female?
Child's date of birth
Has the child's birth been registered in England, Wales or Scotland?
Is this child your:
Have you or anyone else ever claimed Child Benefit for this child?
What is the name and address of the person who claimed Child Benefit for this child?
Does this child live with you in the UK?
Has this child lived with anyone else at a different address to you in the last 12 months?
What date did the child come to live with you?
Are you adopting or planning to adopt this child through a local authority?
